about_the_game:
Stop intruders and maintain security!

Use all your tools to detect enemies, protect buildings, and become the ultimate security guard.

"KEEPING NIGHT" is a fast-paced 2D top-down action-strategy game. Step into the role of a skilled security guard and use weapons, CCTV, and security devices to fend off intruders and safeguard various buildings.

Key Features

  • A Perfect Blend of Strategy and Action
    Operate CCTV cameras and security systems in real time to detect and counter enemies. Experience the thrill of combining strategic thinking with fast-paced shooting action.

  • Diverse Environments and Enemies
    Take on unique challenges in various building layouts, each with distinct obstacles and enemies.

  • Unparalleled 2D Top-Down Experience
    "KEEPING NIGHT" delivers a one-of-a-kind experience, seamlessly blending strategy and action.

  • Solo Play & Future Co-op Updates
    Enjoy exciting solo missions, and look forward to cooperative mode updates in the future.
